name: Factored - Prototype
description:
I created this project a few years ago to prototype the systems for a 3D factory builder game (inspired by Factorio) and decided to release it as-is. This demo includes a short tutorial that walks the player through mining and automating the bare essentials for surviving on a cold harsh planet! Art and models are completely lacking, but there is some limited amount of open-ended play available after the tutorial is completed. Prototyping the following systems were the primary focus:

  • Structure building
  • Factory machines and recipes
  • Machine plugin system
  • Inventory item filtering
  • Conveyor and factory automation
  • Tutorial missions
